description: Employees currently not working on client projects
Not assigned to any project, either client-based or internal, and are waiting for the next assignment
They are either billable or working on an assignment
Employees who are in training or learning stages, typically shadowing senior members of the project to understand processes, tools, and technologies
Employees split their time between billable and non-billable work

Companies keep a small team ready as a buffer, not necessarily on the bench but prepared to be deployed on new or expanding projects. This group might not be working on specific billable tasks but is kept available for rapid development
